about_the_game:
This optional Outnumbered DLC is a thank you to those who already supported the game or want to support the game.

Pro Edition Bonus
  • Start with 20.000 Energy Credits
  • Reduced Ship Configuration System Assignment Cost
  • Color Customization
  • Leaderboards (Note: I understand that the leaderboard should be free, but please see it from my perspective: I am trying to clean the leaderboard of fake scores. Without a paywall, I would lose a crucial layer of protection, leading to more work/pain (cleanup and protection) and less time to focus on creating actual content. If you know of a better way, please let me know!)
  • Funds additional game content and supports the dev to follow his dreams!
detailed_description:
This optional Outnumbered DLC is a thank you to those who already supported the game or want to support the game.

Pro Edition Bonus
  • Start with 20.000 Energy Credits
  • Reduced Ship Configuration System Assignment Cost
  • Color Customization
  • Leaderboards (Note: I understand that the leaderboard should be free, but please see it from my perspective: I am trying to clean the leaderboard of fake scores. Without a paywall, I would lose a crucial layer of protection, leading to more work/pain (cleanup and protection) and less time to focus on creating actual content. If you know of a better way, please let me know!)
  • Funds additional game content and supports the dev to follow his dreams!
name: Outnumbered - Pro Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790S / AMD FX-9590
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290X
  • Additional Notes: Resolution of 1280x1024
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6900K / AMD Ryzen 5 3500X
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD RX 5700 XT.
  • Additional Notes: Resolution of 1280x1024

short_description: The Outnumbered Pro Edition rewards you with Ship Configuration Energy Credits and unlocks additional optional features. Thank you for your support!
